## Отображение vs. обобщение данных

.panelset[

.panel[.panel-name[Output]

.pull-left[
```{r echo=FALSE}
starwars %>%
  select(name, height, mass)
```
]
.pull-right[
```{r echo=FALSE}
starwars %>%
  group_by(gender) %>%
  summarize(avg_ht = mean(height, na.rm = TRUE))
```
]

]

.panel[.panel-name[Code]

.pull-left[

]

```{r eval=FALSE}
starwars %>%

    )
```
